Package chapter12.projects

Class VendingMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • chapter12.projects.VendingMachine
  • public class VendingMachine
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a vending machine. A vending machine is a self-regulating shop. It sells products which can be purchased by customers. A customer selects a product from a list of available products. Then a customer adds coins to the vending machine. If the coins are insufficient or the product is out of stock, they are returned. Otherwise, the product is dispensed. The vending machine does not give change if too much money was added. Products can be restocked and money removed by an operator.
